education.institution: Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology
details: Specializing in Computer Science with a focus on Java development and Full Stack technologies.
Relevant Coursework: Data Structures & Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, Database Management Systems, and Web Technologies.
Consistently maintaining a high GPA of 8.34, demonstrating strong academic focus and technical problem-solving skills.

projects.name: Estate
details: Built a responsive frontend using React and Vite for fast development and modular UI components.
Integrated Google Maps API to display property locations with interactive map markers.
Implemented Firebase Authentication to enable secure login and multi-user access.
Used Firebase Firestore to store property listings, user data, and real-time chat messages.

projects.name: Tomato
details: Designed a dynamic UI using React and Vite for real-time cart updates and order placement.
Developed a RESTful backend with Node.js to manage orders, users, and menu data.
Integrated MongoDB as the database to store orders, user info, and item details.

certifications.name: Academy Cloud Foundations
details: Gained foundational knowledge of AWS cloud services and infrastructure.
Learned about cloud security, architecture, and pricing models.

job_description: JAVA + Gen AI Primary Skills: JAVA, Springboot, Microservices, Github Copilot, Python or TypeScript, CI/CD implementation, Hands-on experience with LLM frameworks (e.g., OpenAI, Hugging Face, LangChain) Secondary Skills: Angular/React, MySQL, AWS
summary: Final Year student with 1 year of experience in full stack development and DSA
